metadata.title: CVE-2020-9488 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper validation of certificate with host mismatch in Apache Log4j SMTPappender. This could allow an SMTPS connection to be intercepted by aman-in-the-middle attack which could leak any log messages sent throughthat appender. Fixed in Apache Log4j 2.12.3 and 2.13.1

criterions.comment: apache-log4j2 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
